overview: In a seedy part of town, word of a new underground sex club is spreading. Once inside the dimly lit hallway of The 4-Doors club, horny men with the need to get off, have a choice of doors to pick from; Anonymous, Role Play, Voyeur, and Submission. These are the sexy and sordid stories of what happens behind these doors. Curious? Turn the knob and step inside.
title: The 4 Doors
